snippet: Stocks edged higher, but investors remained cautious after comments a day earlier from Janet L. Yellen, who suggested that stock prices might be too high.
abstract: Stocks rise moderately following day of intense selling; United States Treasuries rise sharply.
lead_paragraph: Stocks edged higher, but investors remained cautious after comments a day earlier from Janet L. Yellen, who suggested that stock prices might be too high.

headline.main: Modest Advance for the Market a Day After a Sell-Off
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Up in Quiet Trading, While Bond Prices Jump
